examples: The mountaineers slowly ascended the steep slope

definitions.text: go back in order of genealogical succession

examples: She ascended to the throne after the King's death

definitions.text: appear to be moving upward, as by means of tendrils
examples: the vine climbed up the side of the house
The path ascended to the top of the hill
The sun uprising sees the dusk night fled...

definitions.text: move to a better position in life or to a better job; "She ascended from a life of poverty to one of great
